vendor_name: The Chateau Spa & Organic Wellness Resort
title: Malaysia Five-Star Chateau Retreat near Kuala Lumpur with Daily Poolside Breakfast
description:
Cocooned by tropical rainforest in Bukit Tinggi, just under a one-hour drive from Kuala Lumpur, is the five-star Chateau Spa & Wellness Resort. Inspired by an 18th-century French chateau, this fairytale hotel rises from the treetops with breathtaking views across the rolling Berjaya Hills. This peaceful part of Malaysia is renowned for its Japanese Village garden, ornate Four Face Buddha temple and outdoor adventures including golfing, hiking and horse riding.

Home to the award-winning La Sant√© Spa and all-day dining at La Vie and an organic farm, this spectacular resort will leave you wanting for nothing. Nearby attractions include an adventure park with zipline and the Berjaya Hills Golf & Country Club, a 16,000-acre course located 2,500 feet above sea level. Check in for much-needed relaxation, all just a 50-minute drive from the city.
offer_address: KM48, Persimpangan Bertingkat, Lebuhraya Karak, Bukit Tinggi, 28750 Karak, Pahang, Malaysia
